isb:docsection.name: Introduction
isb:docsection.label: introduction
isb:docsection.p: &appName; is a chemical kinetics simulation software package implemented in Java. This software can be used to define a system of interacting chemical species, and the reactions through which they interact. The software can then be used to simulate the reaction kinetics of the system of interacting species.
For more information on the &appName; system, please refer to the home page.

isb:docsection.name: Source Code
isb:docsection.label: sourcecode
isb:docsection.p: The source code for this application and the associated ISB Java library "isb.jar" can be found in the file "isb-src.tar.gz" that was installed in the installation directory you selected for this program.

isb:docsection.name: Documentation
isb:docsection.label: documentation
isb:docsection.p: For documentation on how to use the &appName; program, please consult the &appName; User Manual. For detailed documentation of the application programming interface (API) to the &appName; system, please consult the ISBJava home page.
You will find examples of all three languages in the "samples" subdirectory of the directory in which you install the &appName; software.
